text: WR 102ka, also called the Peony Nebula Star, is a blue hypergiant star. It is found in the constellation Sagittarius and is located near the middle of the Milky Way. It is 92 times larger than the Sun and 3.2 million times brighter. ==Related pages== * Pistol Star * LBV 1806-20 ==References== Category:supergiants Category:Stars
title: WR 102ka
